title: Nero 4 Linux + SERIAL KEY [x86]
description:
Installer is for debian type of linux, it is 32-bit architecture and you have serial code that i ve been tested several times. ENJOY!

INSTALLATION:

1. Unrar Nero4linux.rar [PASSWORD: thepiratebay.se]

1. Run .deb installer[If you are using Ubuntu, software center will do everything for you], then w8 for inst4l.

2. Run Nero 4 Linux, if you don't have desktop icon you can run from terminal by typing: nero.

3. Enter you name and organization[optional], then enter serial key.

You can find serial key in SERIAL.txt file in Nero4Linux.rar archive.

ENJOY!
